targets.expr:
sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="cpu"})
    -
sum(
    kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Running"}
        * on (namespace, pod)
    sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="cpu"}) by (namespace, pod)
)

sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="memory"})
    -
sum(
    kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Running"}
        * on (namespace, pod)
    sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="memory"}) by (namespace, pod)
)

sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="cpu"})
    -
sum(
    kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Running"}
        * on (namespace, pod)
    sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="cpu"}) by (namespace, pod)
)

sum(kube_node_status_allocatable{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="memory"})
    -
sum(
    kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Running"}
        * on (namespace, pod)
    sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="memory"}) by (namespace, pod)
)

sum(sum_over_time(kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Pending"}[24h:1m])) by (namespace, pod)
  * on (namespace, pod)
(kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Pending"} > 0)
* 60

sum(kube_resourcequota{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="requests.cpu", type="used"}) by (namespace)
    /
sum(kube_resourcequota{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="requests.cpu", type="hard"}) by (namespace)

sum(kube_resourcequota{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="requests.memory", type="used"}) by (namespace)
    /
sum(kube_resourcequota{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="requests.memory", type="hard"}) by (namespace)

sum(kube_resourcequota{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="requests.nvidia.com/gpu", type="used"}) by (namespace)
    /
sum(kube_resourcequota{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="requests.nvidia.com/gpu", type="hard"}) by (namespace)

(sum_over_time(sum(
    kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Running"}
        * on (namespace, pod)
    sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}) by (namespace, pod)
) by (namespace)[24h:1m])
    -
sum_over_time(sum(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL{job="gpu-dcgm-exporter", instance=~"$instance"}) by (namespace)[24h:1m])/100)
* 60

(sum_over_time(sum(
    kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Running"}
        * on (namespace, pod)
    sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}) by (namespace, pod)
) by (namespace)[1w:1m])
    -
sum_over_time(sum(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL{job="gpu-dcgm-exporter", instance=~"$instance"}) by (namespace)[1w:1m])/100)
* 60

(sum_over_time(sum(
    kube_pod_status_phase{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", phase="Running"}
        * on (namespace, pod)
    sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="gpu-kube-state-metrics", instance=~"$instance", resource="nvidia_com_gpu"}) by (namespace, pod)
) by (namespace)[30d:1m])
    -
sum_over_time(sum(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL{job="gpu-dcgm-exporter", instance=~"$instance"}) by (namespace)[30d:1m])/100)
* 60

sum_over_time(sum(DCGM_FI_DEV_GPU_UTIL{job="gpu-dcgm-exporter", instance=~"$instance"}) by (namespace)[1w:1m])/100
    /
